Methodologies: Enzymatic; malate dehydrogenase and phosphoenolpyruvate carboxylase
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Teco Diagnostics Carbon Dioxide Reagent Set, an enzymatic quantitative assay for measuring carbon dioxide in human serum using a spectrophotometric method.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for measurement of carbon dioxide level in human serum to aid in assessment of acid-base balance of metabolic alkalosis or respiratory acidosis; for in vitro diagnostic use only.
